name: The One Hero
description:
As a newly hatched DemonLord, all you want is some peace and quiet. But an overly zealous Hero just keep barging into your dungeon, no matter how many times you kill him. 

The One Hero is a singular take on the tower defense genre, with only a single enemy attacking, and only one of each defensive unit available at a time. 

This game was made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam
